Texts.Chs:
已知的宇宙中最珍稀、最尊贵的葡萄酒。
^cyan;+^white;8^cyan;防御^gray;，^cyan;+^white;15%^pink;所有^cyan;抗性^gray;(^white;持续1m^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
The rarest and most highly-esteemed wine in the known universe
^cyan;+^white;8 ^cyan;Defense^gray;, ^cyan;+^white;15% ^pink;All ^cyan;Ress ^gray;(^white;1m^gray;)^reset;
